title: Himi 330
lyrics:
7’s
1.
Sīsū ke ke toe ha’u,
Ki ho kāinga lotu,
Pea ke tokoni mai,
Ki homau loto vaivai,
‘Ai mai ho’ tapuaki,
Ki homau laumālie,
Ke mau kai pea inu,
Pea teu ki hēvani.
2.
Sīsū ke fakafo’ou,
‘A ho’o ngāue lelei,
Pea ke mau hokosi,
‘A ho mā’oni’oni,
Ke mau ma’u ‘a e tui,
‘Oku fa’a ngāue,
‘I he ngāue ‘a’au,
Ko homau ‘Eiki koe. *
